category.item: You can find your App-ID on the Dashboard on www.wsc-connect.com. Please use as your API-URL.
You can find your App-Secret on the Dashboard on www.wsc-connect.com.

The option "Immediately" sends push messages to the users smartphone immediately. This method can slow down some actions on your website. "Batch" collects all notifications and sends them via cronjob in regular intervals. Push messages arrive delayed, but your website will not be slowed down.
Cookie time for the info popup
Time in days, for how long the popup, which informs android users about the app, is not shown, after it has been closed by the user.
